Name: Organic CBD Pet Tincture 900 mg
Short description: Our Broad Spectrum CBD pet tincture can easily be mixed into food or water. - Fast-acting - Naturally relieves stress - Relieves joint pains
Description: Your furry friend deserves the same quality of CBD product as you do. Our USDA organic CBD pet tincture contains broad-spectrum hemp extract which has all the beneficial terpenes in hemp but without the psychoactive THC. This higher concentration formula is great for larger dogs. Give daily to promote calm, restful sleep and joint and mobility health. Contains 7.5 mg per quarter (.25 ml) dropper Total of 900 mg per bottle Ingredients Organic Extra Virgin Olive Oil and Organic Broad-Spectrum Hemp Extract (0% THC) 1 fl oz / 30mL

Name: CBD Dog Chews
Short description: Broad Spectrum CBD dog chews to soothe anxiety and joint pains. Ideal for smaller dogs. - Fast-acting Bacon Beef flavor - Relieves anxiety - Promotes joint health and lessens aches and pains
Description: Get the benefits of CBD for your beloved dog with our beef-flavored dog chews. Made with water-soluble CBD powder for better absorption, you will be giving your dog premium CBD to promote a sense of calm, wellness and to aid joint and mobility health. Name: Organic CBD Tincture Key Lime
Short description: Organic Key Lime flavored Full Spectrum CBD Tincture - Easily add to drinks or smoothies - Relieve stress naturally - Promotes joint health and lessens aches and pains
Description: Our USDA Organic Lime Full Spectrum CBD tincture contains no artificial colors or flavors and can be taken daily to promote calm and improve overall health and wellness. Benefits of full-spectrum hemp extract include the benefits of all the terpenes and phytonutrients of hemp that are believed to enhance the effect of CBD on the endocannabinoid system also known as the entourage effect. Contains 15 mg CBD per serving Ingredients Organic MCT Oil, Organic Key Lime Essential Oil, Organic Stevia, and Full Spectrum Hemp Extract (contains less than 0.3% THC) 1 fl oz / 30mL

Name: CBD Soft Gels
Short description: Easy to swallow CBD soft gels to promote healthy sleep and relaxation. - Easy to swallow - Optimal CBD absorption - Promotes relaxation and healthy sleep
Description:
Want an alternative to tinctures? Our easy-to-swallow premium THC-free CBD soft gels are made with water-soluble nanoemulsion technology which increases bioavailability resulting in a soft gel that maintains potency when ingested so you can feel confident you are receiving the full dosage of CBD per soft gel. Ingredients Organic hemp extract, Polysorbate Emulsifiers, Medium Chain Triglycerides, ?-Caryophyllene, Bovine-Derived Gelatin, Glycerin, Sorbitol and Water.
Contains: Tree Nuts (Coconut)
30 softgels

Name: CBD Cream
Short description: Lightweight CBD lotion perfect for everyday use. - Immediate Healing - Simple and Effective
Description: Looking for a daily CBD lotion that is lightweight and non-greasy? Our unscented THC-free CBD lotion contains 250 mg of CBD and is formulated with high-quality ingredients and is ideal for those with sensitive skin. Ingredients Water/Aqua, Organic Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Organic Glycerin, Cetearyl Glucoside, Cetyl Alcohol, Sorbitan Olivate, Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Extract, Gluconolactone, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Oleosomes, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Tocopherol, Organic Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sea Salt, Calcium Gluconate. 1 fl oz / 30 mL

Name: CBD Salve Stick
Short description: Our CBD Salve Stick provides quick, on-the-go healing! - Easily apply to cracked and dry skin - Instantly soothes and protects
Description:
Looking for a topical CBD salve that is perfect for on the go and fits easily in your pocket or bag? Our premium CBD salve stick contains 250 mg of broad-spectrum CBD and nutrient-rich organic oils that are perfect for soothing dry, cracked skin. Ingredients Organic Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Organic Cera Alba (Beeswax), Organic Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Oil, Organic Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Organic Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Extract, Tocopherol, Organic Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Organic Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract.
Contains: Tree Nuts (Coconut)
0.5 fl oz / 15mL

Name: CBD Salve with Lavender and Eucalyptus
Short description: Enjoy the power of a CBD salve with the added healing properties of lavender and eucalyptus oils. - Heal and nourish extremely dry and cracked skin - Soften aches and pains in joints and muscles
Description: Our organic CBD salve contains 500 mg of CBD per jar and is created using the finest ingredients to help heal and support overall skin health. Our CBD Salve is made from all organic ingredients including nutrient-rich hemp oil, beeswax, and coconut oil which has potent antibacterial, antifungal, and anti-inflammatory properties. An ideal product for healthcare workers who are looking for a versatile product to address dry cracked skin from frequent handwashing. Ingredients Organic Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Organic Cera Alba (Beeswax), Organics Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Extract, Organic Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Organic Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil. Contains: Tree Nuts (Coconut) Net Wt. 1oz (28.35g)

Name: CBD Sports Cream
Short description: Target your sore spots with the cooling sensation of Menthol and the fast-acting power of CBD. - Cooling menthol sensation - Soothes sore muscles and joints - Apply before, during, or after working out
Description: Our sports cream contains 400 mg of premium CBD with cooling menthol and camphor. Can be used before or after a workout or throughout the day to support healthy muscle and joints and improve flexibility. Ingredients Water/Aqua, Organic Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Menthol, Organic Glycerin, Cetearyl Glucoside, Cetyl Alcohol, Sorbitan Olivate, Gluconolactone, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Oleosomes, Cinnamomum Camphora (Camphor) Bark Oil, Phytocannabinoid-Rich Hemp Extract, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Potassium Sorbate, Tocopherol, Organic Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Organic Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Oil, Organic Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Organic Gaultheria Procumbens (Wintergreen) Oil, Organic Origanum Majorana (Sweet Marjoram) Oil, Organic Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sodium Chloride, Calcium Gluconate. 4 fl oz / 118 mL

Name: CBD Bath Bombs

Description: Relax your mind and your body after a stressful day with our CBD Lavender Bath Bombs. Indulge in a relaxing home spa treatment and soak away your stress while relaxing sore muscles and joints. Ingredients Sodium Bicarbonate, Citric Acid, Organic Coconut Oil, Lavender Oil (Lavandula Angustifolia), Water/Aqua, Maltodextrin, Phytocannabinoid-Rich Hemp Extract and Organic Cocoa Seed Butter. Name: CBD Soft Gels with Curcumin
Short description: Easy to swallow CBD soft gels with the added power of Curcumin - the bioactive compound in Turmeric. - Pain Relief - Anti-Inflammatory - Reduce Anxiety
Description:
Enhance your CBD routine with the power of turmeric. Did you know that 75% of the curcuminoid compounds found in turmeric are curcumin?  Curcumin has many health benefits including anti-inflammatory properties!  Our CBD soft gels with curcumin bring you this antioxidant powerhouse in our easy-to-swallow, THC-free, premium CBD soft gels. Our soft gels are made with water-soluble nanoemulsion technology which increases bioavailability. This results in a soft gel that maintains potency when ingested so you can feel confident you are receiving the full dosage of CBD per dose! Ingredients Organic hemp extract, Polysorbate Emulsifiers, Medium Chain Triglycerides, ?-Caryophyllene, Bovine-Derived Gelatin, Glycerin, Sorbitol and Water.
Contains: Tree Nuts (Coconut)
30 softgels

Name: All natural gourmet peanut butter, banana and bacon dog biscuits
Description: All natural gourmet peanut butter, banana and bacon dog biscuits. No chemicals or preservatives just simple human grade ingredients baked in small batches to ensure quality. ABOUT OUR BISCUITS: Made with quality human-grade natural ingredients Made in a commercial grade kitchen in small batches to ensure quality and safety Made with gluten free oat flour No soy, wheat or corn Our fresh baked biscuits come in 7 oz bags in the following flavors: Peanut butter and coconut The Elvis-Peanut butter, banana and bacon Pumpkin Chia Blueberry Because there are no chemicals or preservatives we bake our biscuits to remove as much moisture as possible to extend the shelf life. If you have a dog who has trouble with dry biscuits we recommend the peanut butter and coconut which is more flaky and crumbly compared to the other flavors. Please store in a cool dry place. Use by date on each package. ABOUT US: Our passion is our dogs and we started making biscuits as a way to show love for our beloved senior pug, Milo who was diagnosed in 2015 with mast cell cancer. Strongly believing that what you feed your dog makes a big difference in their health, we set out to switch his diet to healthy human grade ingredients and that included his treats. What better way to ensure this than by creating our own line of biscuits so we have control over what goes into each treat. After sharing them with friends and families and getting rave reviews and requests for more, we decided to partner with a local baker and share these tasty treats with the world. We hope you enjoy our treats, made with love for our dogs and yours.
